mapper.select: select u.user_photo, e.employee_no ,u.user_name, e.department, e.position, u.user_email, u.user_phone, e.company_invited, e.employee_auth from employee e inner join usr u on e.user_id = u.user_id where e.company_id = #{company_id}
select count (*) as countValue from employee e inner join usr u on e.user_id = u.user_id WHERE e.company_id = #{company_id}
